summary: In WWI Africa, a gin-swilling riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced missionary to use his boat to attack an enemy warship.
cast: Humphrey Bogart|Katharine Hepburn|Robert Morley|Peter Bull|Theodore Bikel|Walter Gotell|Peter Swanwick|Richard Marner|Harry Arbour|Errol John|Joseph Layode|Gerald Onn|John von Kotze
